text:
Calling all positive minds:

If you want equity in #COVID19 #vaccine distribution,sign the declaration & tweet any of these: #VaccinEquity #OneWorldAgainstCOVID  #IWantVaccinEquity

Time to shift the 🌏 toward fairness and positive change so we can all be better together!⬇️

🙇‍♀️RT https://t.co/0rNqwaYX84
